msIdentifier.idno: CODRINGTON/READE NO 30. BOXED SEPARATELY IN UN-NUMBERED BOX.

author.persName: Mir Khwand (Muhammad b. Khawand Shah b. Mahmud).

msItem.title: Raudat al-safa. Vol. 1.
msItem.note: (As given by Rieu and Ethe.) Second front flyleaf: Presented to the the Oriental Translation Committee by Sir A Malet Baronet. Inside back cover: armorial bookplate of Sir Cha. Warre Malet. Parts of the same work as Codrington/Reade No 29. Headings and punctuation in red.
msItem.incipit: Zib i fihrist i nuskhah i mafakhir i anbiya

listBibl.bibl: For Sir Alexander Malet's gift see the Transactions, 1830, pp. xxxiv-xxxv.

bindingDesc.p: Oriental brown leather binding with flap and blind-tooled cartouches picked out in white. In poor condition. Covers detached.

acquisition.p: Presented by Sir A. Malet, Bart.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
